verses.roman:
dhīre dhīre jagannātha karena gamana
āge nṛtya kari' calena śacīra nandana

synonyms: dhīre dhīre—slowly, slowly; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; karena—does; gamana—movement; āge—in front; nṛtya—dancing; kari'-performing; calena—goes forward; śacīra nandana—the son of mother Śacī.
translation: The car of Lord Jagannātha began to move slowly while the son of mother Śacī went ahead and danced in front.
